name: Miasto Śmierci
overview: A challenging crosshairs shooter game from LK Avalon. Miasto Śmierci is a science fiction shooter. A mad scientist wants to take control over the world. As a secret agent the player is equipped with a combat robot called MOA. MOA is equipped with a scanner, five types of weapons and an early warning system. During the action unmanned aircraft supply ammunition. The goal is to penetrate enemy territory and gain the scientific research. The same task has been entrusted by two foreign countries to theirs agents: Russia sent Ivan Michalkov and from Germany, Hans Kahlert. The agent moves through the city map and encounter traps (like a mine field) or enemies. The duel with enemies takes place on a single first person perspective screen. Using one of five types of weapons the player must kill a designated number of terrorists to get back to the city map.
